description: Searches metadata and the content of folders, documents, document versions, and comments.

parameters.name: QueryScopes
parameters.description: Filter based on the text field type. A Folder has only a name and no content. A Comment has only content and no name. A Document or Document Version has a name and content (string) ---

parameters.name: AdditionalResponseFields
parameters.description: A list of attributes to include in the response. Used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters results based on entity metadata. TextLocales (list) --- Filters by the locale of the content or comment. (string) --- ContentCategories (list) --- Filters by content category. (string) --- ResourceTypes (list) --- Filters based on entity type. (string) --- Labels (list) --- Filter by labels using exact match. (string) --- Principals (list) --- Filter based on UserIds or GroupIds. (dict) --- Filter based on UserIds or GroupIds. UserIds or GroupIds. Roles (list) --- The Role of a User or Group. (string) --- AncestorIds (list) --- Filter based on resource's path. (string) --- SearchCollectionTypes (list) --- Filter based on file groupings. (string) --- SizeRange (dict) --- Filter based on size (in bytes). StartValue (integer) --- The size start range (in bytes). EndValue (integer) --- The size end range (in bytes). CreatedRange (dict) --- Filter based on resource's creation timestamp. StartValue (datetime) --- Timestamp range start value (in epochs) EndValue (datetime) --- Timestamp range end value (in epochs). ModifiedRange (dict) --- Filter based on resource's modified timestamp. StartValue (datetime) --- Timestamp range start value (in epochs) EndValue (datetime) --- Timestamp range end value (in epochs).

nested_params.name: TextLocales
nested_params.description: Filters by the locale of the content or comment.

nested_params.name: Labels
nested_params.description: Filter by labels using exact match.

nested_params.name: Principals
nested_params.description: Filter based on UserIds or GroupIds.

nested_params.name: Roles
nested_params.description: The Role of a User or Group.

nested_params.name: CreatedRange
nested_params.description: Filter based on resource's creation timestamp.

nested_params.name: ModifiedRange
nested_params.description: Filter based on resource's modified timestamp.

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description: Order by results in one or more categories. (dict) --- The result of the sort operation. Field (string) --- Sort search results based on this field name. Order (string) --- Sort direction.

nested_params.name: Field
nested_params.description: Sort search results based on this field name.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: List of Documents, Folders, Comments, and Document Versions matching the query.

nested_items.description: The type of item being returned.

nested_items.name: WebUrl
nested_items.description: The webUrl of the item being returned.
